product_name: Apple iPhone 14 Pro Max 5G Dual SIM (1TB Space Black) at Â£30 on Refresh Flex (36 Month contract) with Unlimited mins & texts; Unlimited 5G data. Â£86.42 a month.
description: The Apple iPhone 14 Pro Max 5G comes with a 6.7-inch ProMotion technology touchscreen, features Crash Detection and a new Truedepth 48-megapixel front camera with Photonic Engine, an extra hour of video playback compared to last year's model and a new Action mode that provides smoother looking videos with better image stabilization.This is all powered by the Apple A16 Bionic chipset and 6GB of RAM.
product_short_description: O2 Refresh splits your Pay Monthly bill into two parts. The Device Plan is the cost of your phone or tablet, and Airtime Plan is the cost of your data, texts and minutes. You can trade in your phone at any time and put the cash towards paying off your Device Plan. Leaving you free to upgrade to the latest device.
specifications: * Operating System: Apple iOS * Internal memory: 1TB * Colour: Space Black * GPS: A-GPS, GLONASS, Galileo and QZSS * Processor: Hexa-core (2x3.46 GHz Avalanche + 4x Blizzard) * SIM Type: nano-SIM and e-SIM * Dimensions: 160.7 x 77.6 x 7.9 mm * Screen Size: 6.7" * Camera Flash: Dual-LED Dual-Tone * Bluetooth: 5.3 with A2DP, LE * Screen Type: LTPO Super Retina XDR OLED * Weatherproofing / IP Rating: IP68 dust/water resistant (up to 6m for 30 mins) * Weight (grams): 240 * Camera Megapixels: 48 * Chipset: Apple A16 Bionic (4 nm) * Screen Resolution: 1290 x 2796 * Wifi: 802.11 a/b/g/n/ac/6 * Selfie Camera: 12 Megapixels * Cellular support: 2G 3G 4G 5G

Telcos:network_details_json.description: O2 is the commercial brand of Telefonica UK Limited and is a leading digital communications company with the highest customer satisfaction for any mobile provider according to Ofcom. With over 23 million customers, O2 runs 2G, 3G and 4G networks across the UK, as well as operating O2 Wifi.
